moves.4. d4 Bb6 5. Nc3: preparing Na4 to kill this dangerous dsb
moves.7... Nxb6 8. b3: preventing b6 knight moves. So he is now quite blocked
moves.8... Ne4 9. Bd3: repulsing him, but i didnt saw c3 ...
moves.10. Qd2 Ncd5: move for nothing, black had no special plans
moves.11... Nf6: so black has lost a lot of tempos ...
moves.12... h6: why this passive move ? in order to attack with pawns (g5...etc) ?
moves.13. e5: so I decided to attack the centre !
moves.13... Nfd5: this knight cant find his place ...
moves.14. c4 Ne7: with this move I'm occupying completely the centre and wining a lot of tempos, this sell victory !
moves.17. f5 exf5 18. Nxf5: exchanging a lot to clear the game,
moves.18... Nxf5 19. Bxf5 Bxf5 20. Rxf5: here we are ! it's quite dangerous to live this rook in the centre, but I have to finish to develop my strong pawn structure. (d4/d5)
moves.21. d5: great chain ! This pawn chain will make me win : i will get a past pawn from it ...see what follows, end's coming soon (move 31)
moves.21... Nd7 22. Bb2: anticipating Ne5, i will win a pawn and get my past pawn
moves.22... Ne5 23. Bxe5 dxe5 24. Rxe5: pawn won, i have 2 nice pawns with free way to promote (c4 and d5)
moves.25. Kh1 Rfe8: now the things are becoming interesting ...I wont accept the exchange, preferring retaking with the queen in order to keep occupying the centre
moves.26. Qf4 Qg6: careful with Qb1 in case I have to move the rook a1 on another line ...
moves.27. Rae1: preparing to protect the queen after exchange rooks
moves.29. Qe6+ Kh8: And now i just have to push my panws to promote !
moves.31. Qe7: resistance is futile ! black resign. I hope you've enjoyed the game
